unnormalised: Arre yaar! My online payment failed again! This time, buying a saree for mummyji from Flipkart. Shows ₹2,500 debited but order not confirmed. Hope I don't have to run to the bank again. Last time, when my Zomato order of ₹350 got stuck, it took 2 weeks to get the refund! E-commerce, more like e-frustration, am I right? Maybe I should just pay in cash next time, like the old days. #DigitalIndiaProblems #RupeeRage #OnlineShoppingWoes
normalised: Arre yaar! My online payment failed again! This time, buying a saree for mummyji from Flipkart. Shows rupee two thousand five hundred debited but order not confirmed. Hope I I do not have to run to the bank again. Last time, when my Zomato order of rupee three hundred and fifty got stuck, it took two weeks to get the refund! E-commerce, more like e-frustration, am I right? Maybe I should just pay in cash next time, like the old days. hash Digital India Problems hash Rupee Rage hash Online Shopping Woes
